sliderSection.p: Your next-level social platform is here to reshape communication, interactivity and creativity. Socially engaging and technologically oriented, have your own virtual world in the palm of your hands, your imagination is the only limit.

sliderSection.span2: Reshape your idea of a social platform!
sliderSection.p: Create your personal profile, a dimension that is as unique as you are, customize your 3D character, design your virtual space, capture, share, earn respect and grow your social presence.

sliderSection.span2: We made sure that this virtual dimension is YOURS and tailored to your liking:
ul: A futuristic build system allowing you to immerse in the world of your dreams
Build your house, venue, or shop and modify it to your preferences
Share your creation with the world! Invite your friends, join them in their dimension or visit your favorite influencer’s own world and meet them

sliderSection.p: Invite your friends and family to enjoy your social activities from around the globe and at any time, you can host or attend gatherings, play games, explore the virtual world, visit each others’ unique 3D houses, shop together, and share a wonderful interactive experience together.

Try our new social shopping experience empowered by the latest technologies: shop with your friends, browse for products and services, view them in 3D, try them on in AR! Buy them with the safest payment methods and get them delivered to your doorstep

grid.p: From choice to checkout, CheckChack is the perfect platform for your business to bloom: grow your brand, futurize your services, maximize your revenue and reach a broader audience. CheckChack provides business owners and service providers with the most advanced dashboard to have complete control over every aspect of their business.

Grow your social media presence and have every aspect of your business under your thorough monitoring

about.p:
CheckChack took the leading role in achieving a unique sociality approach that is guaranteed to stand out among competitors.
Achieving this tricky task, through innovation, persistence, integrating the latest technologies like Augmented Reality, Virtual Reality and 3D scanning to provide you with a platform worthy of your time and presence.
